posts.content:
Hello,
New to the forum and have my heart set on a Caravette or very similar low light model as I love the original interior and pop top versions.... Can find one around for love or money and absolutely gutted I missed the one sold the other week.. There's one on carandclassic but quite frankly the price doesn't reflect the reality of the condition....

Anyone know of one for sale? I'm not a car dealer, just really love that look of them. I'm specifically looking for a neear to original caravette, low light with a pop top so a somewhat narrow field of search!!!

Thanks
Jackie
what do you mean by low light ?

Do you mean an early bay?

If so try earlybay.com

Hello Both, yes I mean any early bay. I think they are called VW Devon Caravette.

Thanks I'll give earlybay.com a try.

This isn't mine but I wish it was.....

If you are after one I don't think you'll find better.

http://www.classicdigest.com/cars/volkswagen/t2/43952
http://www.thesamba.com/vw/forum/viewto ... sc&start=0

Hi,
Thanks Richard, yep that's the type of thing I'm looking for! posted Nov 2014 so it's probably gone to it's new home a while back.

Guess my field of choice is so narrow it's hard to find these things...

Lee has just put it up for sale, yesterday. He bought it in Nov 2014 and has refurbed everything looking at his thread?

It was at Busfest with him last weekend!

Ah okay, just took a closer look and realised its a tin top. I'm looking for a pop top, Devon Conversion early bay like the one Bo Jangles (Bob) had up for sale a few weeks back. I got in there too late and it was already sold...thanks for keeping an eye out for me though, much appreciated.
I'm going to keep looking out on the sites.
